text: `[Character A]` whip-cracks a serving tray, sending `[Character B]` over the rail.
`[Character A]` skewers `[Character B]` from three buffet tables away.
`[Character A]` spins her umbrella rifle and pops `[Character B]` off the diving board.
`[Character A]` lights a frozen-drink glass—`[Character B]` goes boom.
`[Character A]` yanks `[Character B]` under; bubbles tell no tales.
`[Character A]` ricochets a poker chip into `[Character B]`'s temple—clean KO.
`[Character A]` bucks `[Character B]` clean into a steel beam.
`[Character A]` heel-hooks `[Character B]` straight down the grand stairwell.
`[Character A]` folds his weapon; `[Character B]` doesn’t unfold.
`[Character A]` flings a crunchy disc that scalps `[Character B]`.
`[Character A]` snags `[Character B]`; anchor wins.
`[Character A]` blasts a CO₂ canister; `[Character B]` is carbonated offboard.
`[Character A]` smashes the mic stand on `[Character B]` mid-high note.
`[Character A]` flips a skillet—`[Character B]` is now part of breakfast.
`[Character A]` tips a one-armed bandit onto `[Character B]`.
`[Character A]` fires jawbreakers—`[Character B]` can’t chew bullets.
`[Character A]` stuffs TNT in a beach ball—`[Character B]` is confetti.
`[Character A]` smashes a banjo over `[Character B]`'s noggin.
`[Character A]` pierces Overboard Owen with a burning signal.
`[Character A]` freezes and shatters `[Character B]` with nitro root beer.
`[Character A]` tees a croquet ball off `[Character B]`'s forehead.
`[Character A]` bludgeons `[Character B]` with a frozen brick of rocky road.
`[Character A]` hurls a horseshoe, knocking `[Character B]` into a lifeboat propeller.
`[Character A]` slams the saloon door until `[Character B]` is paste.
Malfunctioning rodeo-bot boots `[Character A]` into `[Character B]`.
`[Character A]` wings a sandal so hard it clotheslines `[Character B]`.
`[Character A]` yanks `[Character B]` into the cheese-fondue pit.
`[Character A]` laces the chips; `[Character B]` handles the last hand.
Rope splits; `[Character A]` whiplashes `[Character B]` into a smokestack.
`[Character A]` detonates confetti with tacks—`[Character B]` bleeds rainbows.
**Spittoon Splash:** `[Character A]` kicks over a full spittoon, blinding `[Character B]` before delivering a final blow with a pool noodle.
**Nautical Knot:** `[Character A]` expertly ties `[Character B]` to the ship's railing using a complex nautical knot just as a rogue wave hits.
**Pool Cue Impalement:** `[Character A]` uses a pool cue like a spear, pinning `[Character B]` to the shuffleboard court.
**Life Preserver Pummel:** `[Character A]` swings a heavy life preserver like a mace, crushing `[Character B]` against the railing.
**Anchor Drop:** `[Character A]` cuts the rope holding a decorative anchor above the stage, squashing `[Character B]` mid-karaoke.
**Skeet Shooting Surprise:** During a skeet shooting session, `[Character A]` "accidentally" swings too far, blasting `[Character B]` off the deck.
**Maraca Mayhem:** `[Character A]` fills a pair of maracas with ball bearings, turning them into deadly bludgeons against `[Character B]`.
**Cactus Catapult:** `[Character A]` rigs a deck chair to catapult a potted cactus directly into `[Character B]`'s face.
**Fishing Line Garrote:** `[Character A]` uses a high-tensile fishing line to garrote `[Character B]` during the sunset viewing.
**Conch Shell Conchussion:** `[Character A]` brings a large conch shell down hard on `[Character B]`'s head.
